My name is Humberto Anjos. Once upon a time, I wrote code for a living. Officially it’s not my job anymore, but that never stopped me before :D

I’ve been using org.sbrubbles as my Java package root for years, so it’s neat to finally own the domain :) But I’m not quite sure what I’ll use this site for. Right now it looks like this will be my dumping ground for any random links, musings and experiments I develop/stumble on along the way.

The main links are in the header.on the left sidebar. Let’s see how far this goes…
